articles.title: 14th Kimjongilia Festival Closes
articles.content:
14th Kimjongilia Festival Closes
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The 14th Kimjongilia Festival that opened on Feb. 12 on the occasion of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthday was closed with due ceremony at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition on Friday.
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop and officials concerned, officials of ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, working people, school youth and children and the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Addressing the ceremony, Minister of Culture An Tong Chun referred to the fact that the 14th Kimjongilia Festival was held with splendor and stressed the need to swap the achievements and experience gained in cultivating and propagating the immortal flowers and boost the exchange and cooperation in the future, too, to keep the flowers of the sun in fuller bloom.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Valery E. Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at his embassy on Thursday to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, Hong Son Ok, vice-chairperson of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy were on hand.
					
					 Valery E. Sukhinin said at the reception that Kim Jong Il, who is well known in Russia as a prominent world statesman, has shown deep care for the development of the traditional friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 Expressing belief that the multifaceted cooperation between the two countries would develop on a new higher stage thanks to their joint efforts, he wished the Korean people signal progress in the drive to build a thriving nation and improve the standard of living.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok in his speech stressed that Kim Jong Il indicated the way for the Korean people and the progressive humankind to follow and has performed undying exploits for the times and history.
					
					 He expressed belief that the bilateral friendly relations with a long historical root would further develop in various domains this year marking the 10th anniversary of the publication of the DPRK-Russia joint declaration and the conclusion of the DPRK-Russia treaty and the 65th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 A reception was also given at the consulate general of Russia in Chongjin on the same day.

articles.title: Iranian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Iranian Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Morteza Moradian, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at his embassy Thursday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Jong Yong Su, minister of Labour, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, and officials concerned.
					
					 Staff members of the Iranian embassy were on hand.
					
					 The ambassador in his speech said that Kim Jong Il defended the destiny of the country and the nation and paved the way for building a great prosperous and powerful nation with his distinguished and seasoned leadership.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would make a great leap forward in the building of a thriving nation by displaying the revolutionary spirit of fortitude and thus hold a grandiose celebration event in 2012, the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Noting that Iran and the DPRK, both standing against imperialism, have closely supported and cooperated with each other in international arenas, he stressed that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger under the deep care of their leaders.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop in his speech referred to the undying feats performed by Kim Jong Il on behalf of the country, the people, the times and history.
					
					 He said that it is the steadfast stand of the DPRK government to set store by and continue to boost the traditional relations of friendship between the two countries the foundation of which was provided by Kim Il Sung together with the leaders of Iran.
					
					 We will, in the future, too, work hard to further strengthen the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation in all fields, he declared.

articles.title: Tradition of Great Upsurge Carried Forward
articles.content:
Tradition of Great Upsurge Carried Forward
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, a gigantic metallurgical industry base in the northern part of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, is taking the lead in a new great revolutionary upsurge with its blast, sintering, heating and electric furnaces operating at full capacity.
					 After sending a letter representing their patriotic zeal to all other working people across the country the workers of the complex overfulfilled their January plan by 8.1 percent in total output value, 1.5 percent in pig iron production, 1.6 percent in steel production and 3 percent in rolled steel production.
					
					 The Korean workers have effected fresh upsurges at each stage of socialist construction, exciting the world people's admiration.
					
					 In the flame of the great Chollima upsurge in the 1950s the workers of the then Kangson Steel Plant produced 120,000 tons of steel from a blooming mill with 60,000-ton capacity and those of the then Kim Chaek Iron Works 270,000 tons of pig iron from a blast furnace with 190,000-ton capacity.
					
					 The workers of the then Kiyang Farm Machine Factory succeeded in making a tractor in some 30 days and those of the then Tokchon Garage a lorry in 40 days to prove the Koreans' true merits.
					
					 A heyday of the era of the Workers' Party was brought about in the 1970s and 1980s, characterized by the spirit of Chollima spurred on by the speed campaign, and solid foundations for the building of a thriving nation were laid in the period of the "Arduous March", forced march on the strength of the Kanggye spirit, Songgang torch and Ranam torch.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who visited the Chollima Steel Complex in December 2008, appreciated its workers for the building of a UHP electric arc furnace in a matter of months and encouraged them to advance in the van of a fresh upsurge again at the speed of Chollima.
					
					 In carrying forward the tradition of great upsurge, the Korean people have created the Huichon speed, a new Chollima speed.

articles.title: Programme of Modeling Society on Juche Idea
articles.content:
Programme of Modeling Society on Juche Idea
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Thirty-six years has elapsed since General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il proclaimed the programme of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea.
					 The proclamation of the programme on February 19, Juche 63 (1974) has made it possible for the Korean revolution, started in Mt. Paektu, to put itself on a higher level and make a steady advance, exalting the dignity and honor of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 In the course of implementing the programme the Korean servicepersons and civilians have grown to be Songun revolutionaries intensely loyal to the Workers' Party of Korea and the leader. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il has developed and enriched the Juche idea, founded by President Kim Il Sung, to clarify the revolutionary world outlook to be possessed by them.
					
					 He has put forward the remolding of men as a fundamental issue of socialist construction and given priority to the ideological work, with the result that they have become strong in ideology and faith.
					
					 The single-hearted unity around the headquarters of the revolution has been consolidated still more in the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Il saw to it that all the issues concerning the revolution and construction were solved according to the President's ideas and intentions and the monolithic leadership system of the Party was established in a thoroughgoing way in the country.
					
					 Prevailing in Korea is the spirit of sharing the same idea, will and destiny with their leader on the basis of the revolutionary unity.
					
					 The DPRK has ushered in a heyday of prosperity, fully displaying the might of the Juche-oriented socialist country.
					
					 While guiding the Korean people to accelerate socialist construction in all its sectors, Kim Jong Il, with the same confidence and will, the same courage and mettle as the President's, steadfastly safeguarded the dignity and sovereignty of the nation in the teeth of the imperialists' intensified anti-socialist moves.
					
					 As a result, the DPRK has emerged as an invincible political and military power with strong war deterrent and had a lot of monumental edifices built across the country in the Songun era.
					
					 The Korean army and people will surely turn the country into a thriving one under Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership, upholding the programme of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea.

articles.title: KCNA Snubs Call for DPRK's Dismantlement of Nukes
articles.content:
KCNA Snubs Call for DPRK's Dismantlement of Nukes
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Piffles that "economic reward" will be given to the DPRK if it dismantles its nuclear weapons are heard from countries around the Korean Peninsula these days.
					 Some of them have gone the lengths of talking nonsense that it is necessary to stop giving such rewards as providing foodstuff, fuel, loan, etc., if the DPRK persistently refuses to dismantle its nuclear weapons and they "will not use money for persuading it into returning to the six-party talks."
					
					 In a word, their utterances mean giving sort of "economic reward" to the DPRK in return for the dismantlement of its nukes.
					
					 This is nothing but sophism that can be let loose only by the worst fools in the world who do not know how things are going there.
					
					 The DPRK had access to the nuclear deterrent by spending a stupendous amount of money while tightening belt and weathering out all sorts of difficulties and ordeals. This was a measure for self-defence to cope with the U.S. nuclear threat. This is aimed neither to threaten others nor to get any "economic benefit" or reward. 
					
					 Those who talked the above-said nonsense are sadly mistaken if they think the DPRK may do such a stupid thing as dismantling its nukes in anticipation of "economic reward" from outsiders. 
					
					 The DPRK has settled everything on its own and with its wisdom, not depending on others. This is the historic review of its socialist construction.
					
					 It is only those stupid that can think the DPRK may barter its nuclear deterrent for a petty amount of money in "economic aid."
					
					 Their assumption is so nonsensical that it is hard to tell whether their foolish behavior was prompted by their ignorance of the reason why the DPRK is boosting its nuclear deterrent or they were making far-fetched assertion, feigning ignorance of it. 
					
					 The DPRK was compelled to have access to the nuclear deterrent for self-defence to protect the supreme interests and security of the country from the U.S. increasing nuclear threat.
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. that pushed the DPRK to acquiring nuclear deterrent and it is, therefore, wholly to blame for the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is the brigandish logic for the U.S., the arch criminal posing a nuclear threat to the DPRK, to demand it dismantle its nuclear weapons.
					
					 The DPRK's dismantlement of its nuclear weapons can never happen even if the earth is broken to pieces unless the hostile policy towards the DPRK is rolled back and the nuclear threat to it removed.
					
					 This is the consistent independent stand and principle of the DPRK.
					
					 The hostile forces including the U.S. are now working hard to force the DPRK to disarm itself and pursuing extreme confrontation with it.
					
					 They are under an increasing pressure from their own countries and other parts of the world to withdraw the nuclear weapons deployed by them there. Much upset by this development, the U.S. is becoming vociferous about the DPRK's nuclear activity in a bid to use it as a pretext for steadily bolstering up its nuclear weapons.
					
					 All facts go to prove that the master key to truly breaking the deadlock in the process to settle the nuclear issue on the peninsula lies in the U.S. drop of its hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defence will remain as ever and grow more powerful to protect the sovereignty and dignity of the nation as long as the U.S. nuclear threat and hostile policy persist. 
					
					 Those who talk about "economic reward" to the DPRK in return for the dismantlement of its nuclear weapons would be well advised to awake from their daydream.

articles.title: US Accused of Disturbing Peace
articles.content:
US Accused of Disturbing Peace
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. vice-president recently announced the government's policy on increasing the budget for nuclear weapons, stressing the need to secure trustworthy nuclear deterrent while talking about "the reduction of nukes".              Timing to coincide with this, the U.S. Department of Defense test-fired an interceptor missile.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a blatant challenge to the desire of mankind for peace and a criminal act of gravely threatening and disturbing world peace and security.
					
					Laying bare the ulterior aim sought by the U.S. in bolstering up the nuclear forces and pushing ahead with the plan for deploying the missile defense(MD) system , the factors of ceaselessly escalating the worldwide arms race and military confrontation, the commentary goes on:
					
					 By putting these scenarios into practice the U.S. seeks to destroy the global strategic structure and contain the big powers it regards as potential "rivals" in a bid to carry out its strategy for dominating a uni-polar world. Another aim sought by it is to put different countries under its "nuclear umbrella" and the MD so as to reduce them to its allies under its "protection" and servants for aggression. By implementing the above-said scenarios the U.S. also seeks to put spurs to the worldwide arms race and get its potential "rivals" locked in it in a bid to throw them into an economic crisis and chaos. A more sinister aim sought by the U.S. is to threaten the whole world with nukes and missiles and mount a preemptive attack on any target any time.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula is fraught with the biggest danger of a new arms race and war at present. Nevertheless, the U.S. is persisting in its moves to deploy the MD targeted against the DPRK.
					
					 Noting that the U.S. reckless action will more adversely affect the process for ensuring peace in the peninsula and the rest of the world, the commentary warns that it will be wholly accountable for the ensuing serious consequences.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday dedicates a signed article to the anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work in which he declared the programme on modeling the whole society on the Juche idea.
					 The work, published on Feb. 19, Juche 63 (1974), formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as an integral whole of the idea, theory and method of Juche and declared it as the supreme programme of the Workers' Party of Korea to model the whole society on the Juche idea.
					
					 The long period since the publication of the work represents a sacred course in which the cause of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea has been steadily developed in depth under the energetic guidance of Kim Jong Il and shining annals in which the undisputed truth of the great revolutionary idea has been fully proved and brilliant victory and century-old changes have been brought about in the Korean revolution and construction, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The wise guidance provided by Kim Jong Il for accomplishing the cause of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea lies in that he has more firmly cemented the revolutionary ranks into an unbreakable integral whole armed with the great Juche idea, the Songun idea and thoroughly met the requirements of the Juche idea in all fields of the revolution and construction and that he has given fullest play to the ideological and moral power of all the servicepersons and people, bringing about an uninterrupted leap forward in the drive to build a thriving nation.
					
					 He is now making an endless forced march of guerrilla style, inspiring all the servicepersons and people in their high-pitched drive for effecting a great surge. 
					
					 His tireless field guidance characterized by super-human will and inexhaustible enthusiasm serve as an engine setting the hearts of all of them afire with patriotic enthusiasm and pledge of loyalty and arousing them to work world-startling miracles in every part of the country without let-up.

articles.title: Sit-in against Authorities' Suppression Goes on in S. Korea
articles.content:
Sit-in against Authorities' Suppression Goes on in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Members of the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea carried on a sit-in strike outside its building in Seoul on Feb. 14 in protest against the puppet authorities' fascist suppression.
					 Kang Ki Gap, representative of the party who participated in the strike, said a week has passed since they launched the strike in protest against the authorities' ceaseless suppression as evidenced by search and seizure of Internet homepage of the party and the issuance of a warrant for the arrest of the secretary general of the party, etc., adding they can not stop the strike even on the Lunar New Year's Day. 
					
					 He noted that the struggle of his party is to frustrate the authorities' moves aimed at stamping out the party and to defend the right of the popular masses. 
					
					 We will wage unflinching struggle, not making even a step backward, no matter how desperately the authorities may try, he stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Cambodia, Nepal, Colombia and Nigeria between Feb. 6 and 11 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister for Royal Palace of Cambodia, said that Kim Jong Il has, indeed, performed great exploits by wisely leading the whole affairs of the country by carrying forward the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 He stressed that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided by the President and Great King Norodom Sihanouk would grow stronger and develop generation after generation under the deep care of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), Dambar Shrestha, minister of Land Reform and Management of Nepal, and Subash Kaji Shrestha, chairman of the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, spoke with high appreciation that Kim Jong Il indicated correct orientation and ways in each period and at each stage of the developing revolution to lead the Korean revolution to victory. 
					
					 Jairo Gonzalez Trujillo, president of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia, noted that Kim Jong Il is enjoying boundless reverence from all the people for his outstanding political caliber and distinguished personality as a great man and referred to the fact that voices lauding him are growing stronger among foreign heads of state and prominent figures. 
					
					Igwanagu Nicholas, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimjongilism, praised
						 Kim Jong Il as an outstanding thinker and theoretician who has developed and enriched the Juche Idea and a great man who has brought about a decisive turn in building a thriving nation with his Songun leadership.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar in Nepal.

articles.title: Clausurado el XIV Festival de Kimjongilias
articles.content:
Clausurado el XIV Festival de Kimjongilias
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ATCC) -- Quedo clausurado este viernes el XIV Festival de Kimjongilias, que habia sido inaugurado el dia 12 con motivo del cumpleanos del Dirigente
					 Kim Jong Il.
					La ceremonia de cierre tuvo lugar en la Exposicion Permanente de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia.
					
					En la ocasion participaron Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop y otros funcionarios correspondientes, los otros de ministerios y organos centrales, militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares y el grupo de felicitacion de los coreanos residentes en Japon.
					
					En su discurso de clausura, el ministro de Cultura An Tong Chun hizo referencia al transcurso solemne del festival y destaco la necesidad de intensificar en el futuro tambien el intercambio y la cooperacion compartiendo los exitos y experiencias logrados en el cultivo y la difusion de las Kimjongilias, de modo que estas flores del Sol florezcan plenamente.

articles.title: ATCC comenta absurdas sofisterias en cuanto al problema nuclear
articles.content:
ATCC comenta absurdas sofisterias en cuanto al problema nuclear
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ATCC) -- En alrededores de Corea se difunden las absurdas sofisterias de que si la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea renuncia las armas nucleares, recibira "beneficios economicos".
					De una parte se oyen absurdidades de que si Corea sigue negando obstinadamente la renuncia nuclear, hay que eliminar el modo de darle el alimento, el combustible, el prestamo y otros precios, "No gastaran dinero para que Corea se retorne a las conversaciones a 6 bandas", etc.
					
					 En una palabra, esas insistencias significan que al precio de la renuncia nuclear la RPDC disfrutara de "beneficios economicos" que ellos den a esta.
					
					 Esto no pasa de ser una sofisteria de los tontos que no conocen la situacion.
					
					 Hasta la fecha, el pueblo coreano llego a poseer el disuasivo nuclear con la inversion de una gran cantidad de dinero apretando el cinturon y superando toda clase de dificultades.
					
					 Esto no es para amenazar a alguien ni recibir "beneficios economicos" de alguien, sino es la medida autodefensiva para defender a si misma frente a la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					 Resulta gran equivocacion el mismo hecho de que piensan en que la RPDC pueda hacer tal tonteria deseando "beneficios economicos" de otros.
					
					 Hasta la fecha, la RPDC ha venido solucionando con sus propias fuerzas, inteligencias y esfuerzos todo lo necesario a si misma sin envidiar las cosas de otros, lo cual deviene el balance historico de la construccion socialista de Corea.
					
					 Aqui se presenta una pregunta: ?ellos, que hablan de tales absurdidades, no conocen verdaderamente el motivo y razon del fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC? o ?se obstinan en sus insistencias dando espaldas a tal hecho?
					
					 Solo tales idiotas podrian abrigar el pensamiento absurdo de que la RPDC podria cambiar el disuasivo nuclear con unos centavos de "apoyo economico".
					
					 Frente a la recrudescente amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. la RPDC se vio obligada a escoger la posesion del disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo para defender los intereses supremos y la seguridad del pais.
					
					 EE.UU. es el autor que obligo a la RPDC la posesion del disuasivo nuclear, razon por la cual  la entera responsabilidad del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana recae sobre EE.UU.
					
					 Si EE.UU., autor de la amenaza nuclear, demanda a la RPDC la  supuesta renuncia nuclear, esto es la teoria irrazonable.
					
					 Mientras que no se pone fin a la politica hostil a la RPDC ni se elimina la amenaza nuclear, esta no renunciara sus armas nucleares aunque se destruyera el globo terraqueo.
					
					 Esto deviene la invariable posicion y principio independientes de la RPDC.
					
					 Ahora, EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles tratan de desarmar a la RPDC y persiguen el enfrentamiento extremo con nuestro pais.
					
					  Ellos afrontan con la creciente presion interna y externa de retirar sus armas nucleares emplazadas en todas partes del mundo.
					
					  Atemorizado con el desarrollo de tal situacion, EE.UU. habla tanto de las actividades nucleares de la RPDC para usarlas como pretexto a fin de seguir manteniendo y fortaleciendo sus artefactos nucleares.
					
					  Todos los hechos demuestran que el eslabon principal para superar de veras el estancamiento del problema nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana reside en que EE.UU. abandonara o no su politica hostil a la RPDC.
					
					  Mientras que existe la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. y sigue su politica hostil, quedara siempre y se fortalecera mas el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo de la RPDC para defender la soberania y la dignidad de la nacion. 
					
					Los que hablan de la renuncia nuclear de la RPDC vs. "beneficios economicos" deben actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta de eso.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena a EE.UU. que perturba la paz
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena a EE.UU. que perturba la paz 
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el vicepresidente norteamericano anuncio la orientacion de su gobierno de incrementar el presupuesto para las armas nucleares destacando la necesidad de procurar el "confiable disuasivo nuclear" en contrasentido a su hablilla de "desarme nuclear". Al mismo tiempo, el Departamento de Defensa de EE.UU. realizo una prueba de interceptacion de misiles.
					 En un comentario individual difundido este viernes, el diario Rodong Sinmun califico esos hechos de desafio frontal al deseo de la paz de la humanidad y de acto criminal que amenaza y perturba gravemente la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					
					 EE.UU. implementa el plan de aumento de las fuerzas nucleares y el de emplazamiento del sistema antimisiles, los cuales podran generar de continuo la carrera armamentista y la confrontacion militar a escala mundial, senala el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					 Mediante la ejecucion de esos planes, el imperio trata de quebrar la estructura estrategica del mundo y realizar a toda costa su estrategia de dominar el mundo al convertirlo en el unipolar manteniendo a raya a otras potencias consideradas como "rivales" potenciales.
					
					 Tambien, intenta admitir a varios paises en el "paraguas nuclear" y en la "red de defensa antimisil" a fin convertirlos en sus satelites y lugartenientes en la agresion que esten bajo la "proteccion" de EE.UU.
					
					 Por otra parte, pretende promover la carrera armamentista a escala mundial e involucrar en esta a los "rivales" potenciales para llevarlos a la crisis y caos economicos.
					
					 El objetivo mas importante de EE.UU. reside en amenazar con armas nucleares y misiles a todo el mundo y atacar preventivamente cualquier blanco en cualquier momento.
					
					 Ahora, la Peninsula Coreana es la region que corre el mayor peligro de nueva carrera armamentista y guerra.
					
					 EE.UU. sigue implantando porfiadamente el sistema antimisiles contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 Los imprudentes actos de EE.UU. influenciaran mas negativamente en la preservacion de la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo.
					
					 EE.UU. se responsabilizara enteramente de todas las graves consecuencias que emanen de ello.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun conmemora aniversario de obra de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun conmemora aniversario de obra de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico en su edicion de este viernes un articulo individual en homenaje al aniversario de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il publicada el 19 de febrero del 63 (1974) de la Era Juche.
					En ella esta formulada la idea revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung como el sistema integral de idea, teoria y metodo del Juche y promulgada la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun la idea Juche como el programa supremo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, comienza el articulista y continua:
					
					El largo tiempo, que data de la publicacion de la obra del Dirigente, es la sagrada trayectoria en que bajo su dinamica direccion, se profundizo sin parar la causa de transformacion de toda la sociedad segun la idea Juche.
					
					Ademas, constituye la orgullosa cronica en que se comprobo la absoluta veracidad de la gran idea revolucionaria y se registraron fulminantes victorias y cambios del siglo en la revolucion coreana y la construccion.
					
					La sabia orientacion del Dirigente se manifiesta en que el consolido mas nuestras filas revolucionarias como invencible ente unido y unicolorizado con la gran idea Juche, la del Songun, materializa cabalmente la demanda de la idea Juche en todas las ramas de la revolucion y la construccion y registra continuos saltos en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera movilizando al maximo la fuerza ideo-espiritual de todo el ejercito y el pueblo.
					
					El continua hoy tambien la marcha forzada al estilo guerrillero encendiendo las llamas de gran auge en el corazon de todos los militares y civiles.
					
					Su infatigable direccion en el terreno, que se realiza con la voluntad sobrehumana e inagotable energia, hace a todos los militares y civiles trabajar con la pasion patriotica y jurar la fidelidad, sirviendo de fuerza motriz que permite engendrar sucesivos prodigios que conmueven al mundo.
